column3: Tell me about Doman gear reoutfitting.
Tell me about artifact gear repair.
Tell me about Eikonic gear reoutfitting.
Tell me about shire gear augmentation.
Oh, I'm something of a traveling tinkerer, you might say.
Came through a while back, saw what the people from the House were up to, reckoned I'd be a part of it. Same with you, ain't it?
Some of the Domans down in the Toll used to be successful craftsmen back in the old country. Naturally, they've a mind to preserve the old traditions. As do I.
Unfortunately, there's only so much you can do without the proper materials. If you can get your hands on them, however, it'd be my pleasure to improve upon their work.
Lots of folk that're fond of the ancient combat arts have taken to wearing traditional equipment, right? Thing is, it's not always in the best condition. I can help with that.
The materials I'll need to do so aren't easy to come by, though, as they're all made by the Illuminati. Then again, you do seem the resourceful sort...

I presume you're familiar with the House's latest line of arms and armament? “Eikonic,” they call it. Fashioned in the image of those legendary items supposedly imbued with the essence of primals themselves, et cetera.
Simply put, they're reproductions. Damn fine ones, to be sure. All credit to the House's artisans. Nevertheless, with the right materials─courtesy of the Illuminati─I can improve upon their work.
See the Bangpots over yonder? That's where our community's best and brightest have come together to develop and produce the finest wares you'll find this side of the Spine.
Least, that's what they'd have you believe. Me, I've got different opinions. Bring me the right materials and you'll soon understand why.
